column6: Deadpool must not only contend with the villainous Street Speeder, but also with a jealous girlfriend! When Siryn comes calling on Deadpool, Copycat takes matters into her own hands!
column8: | colorist:Tom Chu | penciller:Karl Kerschl | editor:Mike Marts | editor:Joe Quesada | editor:Mike Raicht | writer:Buddy Scalera
